duties_responsibilities.duty: Contact past due clients to secure payment arrangements and resolve delinquency, including high complexity accounts that may require research.
Serve as a liaison between the branch and client to ensure streamlined account resolution and deliver the best client experience.
Document accounts, use correct system coding, and submit account maintenance with accuracy, including working on more complex accounts and conducting skip tracing.
Assist less experienced associates with difficult and escalated calls and may provide training for them.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED (Associate's degree preferred)
